scripts.generate-report: npx allure generate allure-results -o allure-report && npx allure open ./allure-report/
scripts.generate-report-mac: rm -rf allure-report && npx allure generate allure-results -o allure-report && npx allure open ./allure-report/
scripts.generate-report-win: rmdir /s /q allure-report 2>nul && npx allure generate allure-results -o allure-report && npx allure open ./allure-report/
